level.heading: Alcohol training and education certification providers.
level.text: The Board shall approve providers of alcohol training and education certification programs for the purposes of:
The certification of managers licensed under ยง 25-120; and
Providing alcohol training and education to a licensee as a result of an order of the Board.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-298
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.
